summary: Iteration 7 - Vite Migration Testing: Frontend successfully migrated from CRA/CRACO to Vite. Fixed allowedHosts configuration issue. All key pages loading correctly.

success_rate.frontend: 100% - All 8 key pages tested and working

context_for_next_testing_agent: Vite migration complete. Frontend now runs on Vite instead of CRA/CRACO. Key fix applied: Added allowedHosts configuration to vite.config.js to allow tape-erp.preview.emergentagent.com domain.

login_page.details: Login page renders correctly with AdhesiveFlow ERP branding, email/password fields, and Login button

login_functionality.details: Login works correctly, redirects to /dashboard with 'Login successful!' toast

dashboard.details: Executive Dashboard loads with metrics (Total Revenue, Active Leads, Production WOs, Low Stock Items), Revenue Overview chart, Collection Status

crm_page.details: CRM Dashboard loads with Leads (7), Accounts (10), Quotations (3), Samples (4), Leads by Status/Source, Recent Leads/Quotations

director_center.details: Director Cockpit loads with 6 Pillars, Cash Position, Production Scrap (6.5%), MTD Sales, Override Queue (1 action required), Redline Control tab

ai_bi_dashboard.details: AI Business Intelligence page loads with Ask AI, Insights, Predict, Smart Alerts tabs, query input, suggested queries, Recent Queries panel

inventory_page.details: Inventory Dashboard loads with Items (3), Warehouses (5), Low Stock (2), Transfers (4), Stock Value (â‚¹4,750), Stock by Category, Quick Actions

production_page.details: Production Dashboard loads with Work Orders (7), In Progress (5), Active Machines (5/5), Avg Wastage (6.5%), WorkOrder Status, Recent WorkOrders, Quick Actions

navigation_sidebar.details: Sidebar visible with all menu items: Dashboard, Director Center, CRM, Inventory (collapsible), Production, Procurement, Accounts, HRMS, Sales Incentives, GST Compliance, Analytics, AI Dashboard, Quality, Approvals, Reports, Customization, Power Settings

vite_migration_details.issue_resolved: Blocked request error - host not allowed
